segments.text: Great ! I landed on Classic Movies .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I didn't know you liked old movies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I love them , especially the all-time greats like Gone With the Wind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're so right ! Today's movies are just too commercial !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sometimes I think Oscars are only awarded to movies that make a lot of money .
segments.speaker: S1
